message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

I understand you're looking to meet in the middle, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make a profit. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1050000. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I understand you're trying to make a profit, but $1050000 is still above my budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product, which I think is a fair price considering its value to me.
